record.title: EXTENSION OF MORNING BUSINESS
record.narrative:
EXTENSION OF MORNING BUSINESS -- (Senate - December 08, 2008)

[Page: S10793]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that morning business be extended for 1 hour, with Senators permitted to speak for up to 10 minutes each.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent to be recognized as in morning business for 20 minutes.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
